sentences.en: But covet earnestly the best gifts: and shew I unto you a more excellent way.
sentences.cn: 你们要切切的求那更大的恩赐、我现今把最妙的道指示你们.

sentences.en: But covet earnestly the best gifts: and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way.
sentences.cn: 你们要切切的求那更大的恩赐,我现今把最妙的道指示你们.

sentences.en: Covet not a gold - threaded robe. Cherish only your young days !
sentences.cn: 劝君莫惜金缕衣,劝 君惜 取少年时.

sentences.en: Difficult differentiate of around and false, nevertheless covet trade searches Alibaba engine is not fathomless.
sentences.cn: 前后真假难辨, 不过阿里巴巴垂涎商贸搜索引擎并不难理解.

sentences.en: I had nothing to covet; for I had all that I was now capable of enjoying.
sentences.cn: 我一无所求, 因为,我所有的一切,已尽够我享受了.

sentences.en: If it be a sin to covet honor, I am the most sinning soul alive.
sentences.cn: 如果说向往荣誉是一种罪过, 那么我就是活着的最为罪恶的灵魂.

sentences.en: Jingqiu Li has the kind of programming skills employers covet.
sentences.cn: 李景秋有着雇主所垂涎的编程技能.

sentences.en: Many large companies covet these low - cost acquisition of troubled small companies.
sentences.cn: 许多大公司都觊觎低价收购这些陷入困境的小公司.

sentences.en: Mr Appleby does not covet power.
sentences.cn: 艾波比先生不觊觎权力.

sentences.en: Never covet shoes'beauty while torment your feet.
sentences.cn: 切莫只贪图鞋的华贵,而委屈了自己的脚.

sentences.en: Some sites covet ill - gotten gains and sell the personal information of users.
sentences.cn: 有些网站贪图 不义之财,将用户的个人资料出卖.

sentences.en: The Michelin Awards are coveted by restaurants all over the world.
sentences.cn: 米其林评级是全世界所有餐厅的渴望。

sentences.en: Wherefore, brethren, covet to prophesy, and forbid not to speak with tongues.
sentences.cn: 所以我弟兄们, 你们要切慕作先知讲道, 也不要禁止说方言.

trans.tran_en: to have a very strong desire to have something that someone else has
